Class ProductCrawlerBean

java.lang.Object
gov.nasa.pds.harvest.search.oodt.crawler.ProductCrawlerBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
PDSCoreMetKeys
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProductCrawler
public abstract class ProductCrawlerBean extends Object implements PDSCoreMetKeys
Turns a ProductCrawler into a Spring-configurable entity.
Author:
bfoster (Brian Foster)
